title: Behavior of a function from derivative values

Let f be a function that is twice differentiable on <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mo>-</mo> <mn>2</mn> <mo><</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo><</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeGacaakiaakoiaac2 cacaaIYaGaeyipaWJaamiEaiabgYda8iaaikdaaaa@3E95@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> and satisfies the conditions in the table above. If <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow> <mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeGacaakiaakoabaaa aaaaaapeGaamOzamaabmaapaqaa8qacaWG4baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGa eyypa0JaamOzamaabmaapaqaa8qacqGHsislcaWG4baacaGLOaGaay zkaaaaaa@429A@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> what are the x-coordinates of the points of inflection of the graph of f on <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeGacaakiaakoiaac2 cacaaIYaGaeyipaWJaamiEaiabgYda8iaaikdaaaa@3E95@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>?

choices.label: There are no points of inflection on <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeGacaakiaakoiaac2 cacaaIYaGaeyipaWJaamiEaiabgYda8iaaikdaaaa@3E95@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>.

topic.text: 5.6: Determining Concavity of Functions over Their Domains

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
